= jZebra Raw Printing API =

[ttp://code.google.com/p/jzebra/wiki/ScreenShots http://lh4.ggpht.com/_9hmP3Ho0t14/TUYf2osL_0I/AAAAAAAAAfU/wAMhDzK00kw/bottom.png]

== Print barcodes, receipts and more from a web page ==

Features:
  *  100% Free and open source software (FOSS, [http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html GPL]).
  *  Free to use in commercial applications (check GPL license for details)
  *  Sends *raw print commands*, *CHR/ASCII codes*, *ESC/P codes* to your printer.  (e.g. standard ESC commands, EPL commands, ZPL commands, PCL commands, etc.)
  *  Compatible with Windows, Mac OS X, Ubuntu, Solaris and more!
  *  Tested with *Firefox*, Safari, Internet Explorer, Opera
  *  Supports COM ports, Parallel ports, USB ports, Firewire ports, Network Printing, etc.
  *  Written in Java
  *  Loads in your web browser as an applet (similar to a flash object)
  *  AJAX compatible by using JavaScript to control print jobs
  *  Popular for thermal and magnetic printing

Read more about jZebra [About here]. *Getting started* for web developers, see [TutorialWebApplet web applet tutorial].  

For a *quickstart* guide, download the [http://code.google.com/p/jzebra/downloads/list latest version] and view the attached *sample.html* demo.

= Update History =
  * `01/12/2011:` Version 1.1.1 available (not featured, see downloads).  Adds a new `appendFile()` feature similar to original 1.0.3 and older functionality `CONFIGPATH="http://site/epl.txt"`.
  * `01/08/2011:` Version 1.1.0 available.  Fixes XML parsing error discovered in Internet Explorer.  Please note, the JavaScript in sample.html has timing improvements added in lieu.
  * `01/07/2011:` Version 1.0.9 available.  Adds experimental [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Windows-1252 Cp1252] support, [http://code.google.com/p/jzebra/wiki/TutorialWebApplet#XML_Printing XML message parsing] support.
  * `12/08/2010:` Version 1.0.7 available for improved digital signature support.  Versions 1.0.7 and higher will use the same trusted java signature: see source:/jzebra.ks.
  * `11/20/2010:` Version 1.0.6 available for download.  Added feature that allows larger print jobs to be spooled as separate jobs to the printer. (Example, every 5 labels spools a new print job) 
  * `01/06/2010:` An excellent article [http://paparadit.blogspot.com/2010/06/raw-printing-from-web-based-application.html "RAW Printing from Web Based Application"]
  * `04/13/2010:` Version 1.0.5 available for download.  Fixed "Magic Cookie" issue thank to James at ZenKraft.
  * `12/03/2009:` Updated applet tutorial for version 1.0.4.
  * `11/19/2009:` Version 1.0.4 available for download.  Note:  Code changes will need to be made to incorporate new version!!
  * `11/07/2009:` Uploaded more [ScreenShots screenshots] for Ubuntu 9.10 and Windows XP.
  * `11/06/2009:` [TutorialRawOSX Raw Printing from Mac OSX] created in [http://code.google.com/p/jzebra/w/list wiki] section
  * `10/24/2009:` [http://reasontransport.com ReasonTransport] to test Bluetooth printing capabilities
  * `01/09/2009:` [TutorialWebApplet] added to [http://code.google.com/p/jzebra/w/list wiki] for 1.0.3 usage
  * `12/30/2008:` jZebra 1.0.3 pre-release avaiable:  Check the [http://code.google.com/p/jzebra/downloads/list downloads].
  * `11/07/2008:` jZebra 1.0.3 under development:  Check [http://code.google.com/p/jzebra/source/checkout SVN] if curious.
  * `11/06/2008:` Added 1.0.2 Bugs/Issues: [http://code.google.com/p/jzebra/issues/list click to review issues]
